content.value: The best is Chapinorte itself . The house is a mixture of environments and feelings. I have private rooms with shared bath or ensuite. Rooms with double bed or twin, thinking of your comfort. It gives a touch of home and tranquility for your rest and safety,But also with its own characteristics of a International hostel, with tourist information, common areas, kitchen, affordable prices, bilingual staff and Antonio, the owner!.

All of this with a modern design style, edgy, more like a Boutique lodging. Our competition may presents as boutique itself, But that will be only words. We want to make sure we are a really Boutique house, comfort, design, technology, service and attention
A different concept because from your arrival until your check out everything will be but great surprises. We WANT make easier your stay in Bogota and for this we will have the technological and human means for that. We know what you want, we know what you need so WE will do our best to offer it, and all, for free.

Free Wlan for all time and space, parking 24 hours *, payment in cash, dollars or credit cards (via paypal with paypal commision), late check out if necessary*. Amenities if need it, dryer, cable tv, airport or bus station pick up or wherever you need as optional*.These are some of the advantages that will have for your stay in Chapinorte. But there are still more that you will discover from the moment you enter the apartment door . You can check by yourself.
